knimeNode.name: JSON_select_Knime
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates two tables: one with a serialized json representation and one that contains a filtered aggregated version

fullDescription.intro:
In the first input table the iterator key and are specified.
The iterator key indicates which json key should be iterated over. The json-keys can be found as column headers in the serialized result table. The aggregation keys are optional. They are also json keys that can be found in the serialized result table. An aggregation key is added as a column in the filtered result table with the matches for each iteration.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)

ports.inPort: There are two columns, where the second one is optional. The first row is the JSON iteration key. The following rows are the aggregations over that key
